001package org.relationlearn.classifiers;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import org.relationlearn.exception.ClassifierNotTrainedException;
005import weka.classifiers.Evaluation;
006import weka.classifiers.functions.LibSVM;
007import weka.core.Instance;
008import weka.core.Instances;
009import weka.core.SerializationHelper;
010
011/**
012 * Class used to encapsulate all operations that may be performed with an 
013 * SVM classifier including storage of trained classifiers and classification 
014 * of Instance objects generated by code.
015 * 
016 * @see org.relationlearn.util.InstanceGenerator
017 * @see weka.classifiers.functions.LibSVM
018 */
019public class SVMClassifier {
020    
021    private final LibSVM SVM;
022    private Instances TRAIN_INS;
023    
024    /**
025     * Constructs a new untrained SVM classifier.
026     */
027    public SVMClassifier() {
028        SVM = new LibSVM();
029    }
030    
031    /**
032     * Constructs a new trained SVM classifier using the data stored in the
033     * {@code model} parameter.
034     * 
035     * @param model the File containing the trained classifier and its dataset
036     * @throws Exception if any error regarding file reading or object
037     * deserialization happens
038     */
039    public SVMClassifier(File model) throws Exception {
040        Object objs[] = SerializationHelper.readAll(model.getAbsolutePath());
041        SVM = tryCastObject(objs[0], LibSVM.class);
042        TRAIN_INS = tryCastObject(objs[1], Instances.class);
043    }
044    
045    /**
046     * Sets specific SVM classifier options. 
047     * <p/>
048     * For more info on options paramters
049     * please refer to the {@link weka.classifiers.functions.LibSVM} javadoc
050     * page.
051     * 
052     * @param options option array to be passed to the SVM classifier
053     * @throws Exception if option parsing fails
054     */
055    public void setOptions(String options[]) throws Exception {
056        this.SVM.setOptions(options);
057    }
058    
059    /**
060     * Trains this SVM classifier with the data found in {@code trainData}.
061     * 
062     * @param trainData the data to be used for this classifier training
063     * @throws Exception if any problem related to the SVM classifier happens
064     */
065    public void trainClassifier(Instances trainData) throws Exception {
066        SVM.buildClassifier(trainData);
067        TRAIN_INS = trainData;
068    }
069    
070    /**
071     * Tries to store both the classifier and the training dataset in the path
072     * {@code path} in serialized form.
073     * 
074     * @param path the path where the data will be stored
075     * @throws Exception if any error related to the serialization process
076     * happens
077     */
078    public void storeModel(String path) throws Exception {
079        Object objs[] = new Object[2];
080        objs[0] = SVM;
081        objs[1] = TRAIN_INS;
082        SerializationHelper.writeAll(path, objs);
083    }
084    
085    /**
086     * Classifies the Instance {@code instance} and returns its prediction
087     * value.
088     * 
089     * @param instance the Instance to be classified
090     * @return the prediction value for this Instance
091     * @throws Exception if any error related to the classification happens
092     * or if the classifier is not trained
093     * 
094     * @see Instance
095     */
096    public double classifyInstance(Instance instance) throws Exception {
097        if(TRAIN_INS != null) {
098            return SVM.classifyInstance(instance);
099        } else {
100            throw new ClassifierNotTrainedException();
101        }
102    }
103    
104    /**
105     * Evaluates this classifier using a the test Instances provided by
106     * the parameter {@code test}.
107     * 
108     * @param test the Instances to be used in evaluating the classifier
109     * @return the array of prediction values
110     * @throws Exception if any error related to the evaluation happens
111     * or if the classifier is not trained 
112     */
113    public double[] testClassifier(Instances test) throws Exception {
114        if(TRAIN_INS != null) {
115            Evaluation eval = new Evaluation(TRAIN_INS);
116            return eval.evaluateModel(SVM, test);
117        } else {
118            throw new ClassifierNotTrainedException();
119        }
120    }
121    
122    private <T> T tryCastObject(Object objs, Class<T> type) 
123            throws IllegalArgumentException {
124        if(!type.isInstance(objs)) {
125            throw new IllegalArgumentException("File is not a correct model");
126        } else {
127            return type.cast(objs);
128        }
129        
130    }
131
132}
